name: Eternal Game Launcher Edition
description:
Eternal: Lulu and Xari

The cute short side scroller game,  playing as a cute doggo you play through a series of jumping puzzles looking for memory. The memory can be tricky and hard to find, as well as hidden behind special locked doors that require barking to open up. Locate all memory of your past life and get a happy ending! Keep in mind, the clock is ticking!

Life? Death? Reincarnations? You will experience it all!  

- About this Game Version?

This Version Requires the Game Launcher to Run. 

- Unlocks 3 Achievements

- Discord Time Score/ Memory Shoutout
